meanings.definition: An impression or mark made on a surface by a person's fingertip.
meanings.sent1: The detective found fingerprints on the glass table.
meanings.sent2: The suspect's fingerprints matched those found at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The fingerprints on the cake showed who couldn't resist a taste.
meanings.sent4: Her unique fingerprints left a lasting impression on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The fingerprints on the wet paint revealed the culprit's identity.

meanings.definition: A distinctive characteristic or identifying mark.
meanings.sent1: Each artist has their own creative fingerprints in their work.
meanings.sent2: The fingerprints of the company were evident in every product they released.
meanings.sent3: His fingerprints of humor were all over the office prank.
meanings.sent4: The fingerprints of time could be seen in the worn-out pages of the book.
meanings.sent5: The fingerprints of tradition were deeply embedded in the cultural celebration.
